title: Taku Inokuchi
text: is a former <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Rugby%20Union">rugby union</a> player who played as a <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a>. He spent his whole career playing for <a href="Toshiba%20Brave%20Lupus">Toshiba Brave Lupus</a> in Japan's domestic <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a>, playing over 10 times. He was named as a backup player for <a href="Japan%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Japan</a> for the <a href="2007%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2007 Rugby World Cup</a>, making two appearances in the tournament. He made a further 5 appearances for Japan, scoring a try.
